description: The Ceph revolution: delivering enterprise-grade storage networks with open source and hardware you already have. Ceph is open source storage software. Ceph can be used with commodity, everyday hardware to deliver enterprise-grade storage at low-cost, highly available, highly resilient. This presentation will show how it works, what it can do and why it's the best option for serving storage today.
title: The Ceph revolution: delivering enterprise-grade storage networks with open sour
